ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Text history loss when switching screen modes
ygData.msgSnippet: I ve seen this problem for about a week or so.  Other people I ve grouped with have said they have seen this problem before - I don t think it s strictly bard
ygData.messageBody:
I've seen this problem for about a week or so. Other people I've grouped
with have said they have seen this problem before - I don't think it's
strictly bard or bard-grouping related.

I don't think the repeat switching works for me - but I'll give it a try...

Slyde

-----Original Message-----
From: Gordon Hughes [mailto:ghughes@...]
Sent: Friday, September 01, 2000 9:20 AM
To: eqbards@egroups.com
Subject: RE: [eqbards] Text history loss when switching screen modes


I noticed this too, this morning. Something must have happened overnight,
because everything was fine when I was playing last night.

I found that switching back and forth a couple of times brought the history
back.
